name: retps
body: -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cr), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cr), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))))
-| wceq(cr, cuni(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
-| wcel(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ctop)
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), ℝ >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(topGen ` ran((,)))> }
⊣ ℝ = ⋃(topGen ` ran((,)))
⊣ (topGen ` ran((,)))∈ Top

-| wceq(cr, cuni(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
-| wcel(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ctop)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), ℝ >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(topGen ` ran((,)))> }
⊣ ℝ = ⋃(topGen ` ran((,)))
⊣ (topGen ` ran((,)))∈ Top

-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cr), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))))
-| wcel(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ctop)

-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cr), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))))
cumulated.pretty:

comment: The standard topological space on the reals. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2012.)
